title: Welcome to Trigger's Development Server!
desc: This is a server for 50% discussion and feedback of trigger_death's Tools & Games, and 50% just good ol' socialization... Please bug me.
rules: Always read the channel descriptions before posting.
Keep memes in <#526256638890606592>. (With the exception of music)
Bot farming commands like `t!fish` and `t!tg` are banned.
Be a brute, get the boot. Be a dick, get kicked.
*Let's all have fun and play together!*

channels.desc: Show server info and trigger_death's development backlog.
Discussion and Bug Reports for Trigger's Tools & Games.
Discuss development of your own programs, etc.
Testing for <@&524724652870860801> commands. Anyone can participate.
